notes: The product cannot control which architecture is being used.
The product cannot enable BitLocker without a compatible TPM or user-specified password.
The product will not automatically update windows versions, this could have far-reaching consequences for customers.
The product will not automatically format customer's drives, this could cause massive data loss.
For the changes made from this rule to take effect, a reboot is required.
